title: Retirement Advisor: Desperate For Income
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Analyst Marc Gerstein argues that senior secured loans are a safer bet than junk bonds, but even he considers them aggressive. This podcast (7:52) favors privately owned real estate as a source of income for those comfortable with that commitment, but suggests that accepting today’s low yields is a better choice than accepting a level of risk that can ruin your retirement. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
